scripts.dev: rm build/reset.css; ln -s ../reset.css build/reset.css; tsc --watch --project ./tsconfig.json --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir types > /dev/null & webpack --mode=development --watch --progress --config ./webpack.ts; fg
scripts.build: rm build/reset.css; cp reset.css build/reset.css; tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir types > /dev/null & webpack --mode=production --progress --config ./webpack.ts & wait
